title: Whirlpool 265 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Magnum Steel, IF INV CNV 278 MAGNUM STEEL (3S)-N)

product_specification.Other Features: Adaptive Intelligence, 5 in 1 Modes, Microblock + Zeolite Technology, Freshflow Air Tower with Flexi Vents, Honeycomb Moisture Lock Crisper Cover, Active Deo, Auto-connect to Home Inverter
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Unit and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Whirlpool
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Adaptive Intelligence: This refrigerator continuously analysis data to offer maximum cooling for lasting freshness.
product_description.IntelliSense Inverter Technology: This feature adapts the cooling as per the internal load of this refrigerator. As a result, it reduces energy consumption and delivers impressive performance even during power outages. During power cuts, this refrigerator connects automatically to your home inverter for consistent cooling and long-lasting freshness for up to 15 days.

Awesome performance, perfect to the purpose.
Everything described about this refrigerator is one hundred percent correct.
Looks are awesom, even though nowadays LED lights are being used but this one has yellow light I am not sure if this is LED or not but as you can see in images the light increased the attractiveness.
User manual has nothing good for operation you have to dig a lot on internet to understand the modes and what type of cooling will be provided in which mode.
You can not identify what to do if you want manual cooling in upper and lower compartment.
After searching a lot I have came to conclusion that the best mode for this refrigerator is ****Flexi Cool=Auto and Nob in refrigerator=Normal**** in this setting you can get icebox ready in approx 2.5Hrs.
Please note you can not run this refrigerator in highest mode i.e. nob=deep freez and flexi cool=high for more than 4 hrs.
If someone can help me with ( which setting I do require for high cooling in lower compartment and normal cooling in freezer compartment) I will really appreciate it.

This is one of the best Refrigerator which I have received. Thank you Flipkart for keeping this Refrigerator in your Catalog. After researching in Internet, came to know that this is the best refrigerator of the year and very happy to see the design and the cool temperature of this product 😀😀

" Whirlpool is Whirlpool" in a fridge segment. Everyways it's better than any other brands as per my personal view.

Performance: Though I am using this model for 3 days. But I tried every types of checking. It's making ice in 45 mints in normal/ auto mode. Making icecream in 2.5 hours in Deep freezer mode. Vegetables are fresh and milk are not damaged even after 8 hours of electric cut off.

Electric Consumption: 190 unit per year as written in the fridge, but still I am not sure as I didn't check it with proper checking but honestly it is consuming very lesser than the previous 3 star fridge.

Design: In design it's spacious. But I need more options like covered bread space inside. And bottle holders and small Vegetables like lemon , chilly holder inside vegetable bucket were missing as I saw in the same model's fridge in others house. Don't know why these are jot there. It's 5.4 ft in hight.

Delivery: Delivery was smooth. Delivery person was using every possible options to make the delivery Hygienic and better.

Installation & Demo: I had to face a lot of issue in demo & installation. I called several times to flipkart CC and whirlpool cc. But didn't get much solutions. Then I get to contact with local Area managers of whirlpool and he personally get this issue resolved. But Demo is not fully convincing.

Overall: Overall it's a good product. You can obviously go for this. A lot of person can tell that thus one is not fully convertible as like samsung one but I am assuring that u will get an option of convert the frizer to fridge if u are not required of ice. Or more chilling. But u cannot keep vegetables in converted frizer then also. And u can go for 5 convertible mode in this fridge, where the temperature is preset. But in Samsung u have to set the temperature as well. So if u are having less technical persons in family then u should opt for Whirlpool one as it is not confusing. So if u are opting for this u will have happiness !!!!
